name: The Bottom of the Snow
description:
Controls

----------

* [WASD/Arrow Keys] - Movement

* [Space] - Jump

* [E] - Interact

* [R] - Use Shovel

* [R] + [S] - Shovel down

Instructions

----------

The Bottom of the Snow is a game where you play an eskimo in a snowstorm trying to protect your home by getting rid of snow and survive the harsh climate. 

* Sleep in the bed to refresh energy.

* Use the fireplace to warm up

* Eat fish to avoid starving

* Items may be hidden within the snow

* Befriend a seal! (and if you're nice to him you might even get rewards)
